channel.title: Matter for Michael Arthur

item.title: Logger Is the Missing Console for Shortcuts Power Users
item.description: The main Logger app.Filters for messages saved in Logger. That’s all there is to Logger, but it’s exactly the console view I’ve long wanted Apple to build right into Shortcuts itself.

item.title: The danger of emotional reasoning and using our emotions as proof
item.description: One such distortion is emotional reasoning. This is a thought pattern in which our emotional reactions, or our feelings, lead us to believe that something is true even when the empirical evidence tells us otherwise.
item.content:encoded: One such distortion is emotional reasoning. This is a thought pattern in which our emotional reactions, or our feelings, lead us to believe that something is true even when the empirical evidence tells us otherwise.
item.itunes:author: Matter
item.itunes:summary: One such distortion is emotional reasoning. This is a thought pattern in which our emotional reactions, or our feelings, lead us to believe that something is true even when the empirical evidence tells us otherwise.

item.title: Florida lawmakers advance homophobia to DeSantis’s desk

item.title: Why Canada is losing affordable rental housing faster than it's being built
item.description: With rental rates on the rise, he knows that losing his apartment would be a big financial blow. "To find an affordable apartment, I'd have to go way the hell out to Sudbury or somewhere," he told The Fifth Estate.

item.title: COVID-19 pandemic has brought out the worst in people, pulled Canadians further apart, survey suggests

item.title: Why placebo pills work even when you know they’re a placebo
item.description: In one clinical study, researchers asked patients recovering from spine surgery to pair their active pain medication with open-label placebos and also to take the placebo pills on their own. The placebo pills began exerting their own pain relief.
item.content:encoded: In one clinical study, researchers asked patients recovering from spine surgery to pair their active pain medication with open-label placebos and also to take the placebo pills on their own. The placebo pills began exerting their own pain relief.
